title: A Ski Instructorâ€™s Pre-Season Training Secret: Rollerblades
sub_head: A ski enthusiast turned to in-line skates to improve his technique
body:
Even ski instructors need to work on their turns.
Larry Camp, 59 years old, has been skiing for over 40 years but never took lessons. A cartographer by trade, he started teaching skiing at Whitetail Resort in southern Pennsylvania as a side hustle in 2017.
